task.title: Edit a storage container
task.shortdesc: You can modify storage container CHAP authentication in the Element UI.

keywords.indexterm: virtual volumeschanging CHAP authentication on a storage container

step.cmd: Click the Actions icon for the storage container you want to edit.
In the resulting menu, select Edit.
Under CHAP Settings, edit the Initiator Secret and Target Secret credentials used for authentication.

info.note: If you do not change the CHAP Settings credentials, they remain the same. If you make the credentials fields blank, the system automatically generates new secrets.
